title: Bully’s Life On Tour: Drinking Tea And Champagne, And Writing On The Road
text:
Bully’s Life On Tour: Drinking Tea And Champagne, And Writing On The Road 
Published By: MTV - Today 
Bully's working on new music on the road. We check up with the band to see how life on the road is treating them....
